titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Agriculture to use certain unexpended disaster assistance funds, to the extent necessary, to provide emergency crop loss assistance for certain losses, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S3363)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Production.

committee.name: Senate Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
committee.subcommittee: Agricultural Production and Stabilization of Prices

bill.summary: 3/22/1993--Introduced. Requires the Secretary of Agriculture to use certain unexpended disaster assistance funds for emergency crop loss assistance to producers who suffered weather-related losses during January through March 1993.
